Projects.title: A small selection of recent projects

1.title: MarketMinds Analytics - Trading Analytics Platform
1.description: A Django-based trading platform offering streamlined subscription management with Stripe integration, direct content delivery via 'Trade Insights,' and essential financial metrics in a user-friendly custom admin panel.

2.title: VendorVerse - Dynamic Multivendor E-Commerce Platform
2.description: VendorVerse is an advanced multivendor e-commerce system designed to provide seamless buying and selling experiences.

3.title: Airbnb - Clone
3.description: Developed an Airbnb clone to explore modern technologies. Utilized React and Next.js for the frontend, and Django and Django REST Framework for the backend.

1.quote: Working with Angelo was a fantastic experience from start to finish, and I can fully recommend him. The modern design has already garnered a few compliments from our clients. I'm glad I took the step to professionally enhance our online presence. Thank you, Angelo!
1.name: Sebastian Roslon

2.quote: Collaborating with Adrian was an absolute pleasure. His professionalism, promptness, and dedication to delivering exceptional results were evident throughout our project. Adrian's enthusiasm for every facet of development truly stands out. If you're seeking to elevate your website and elevate your brand, Adrian is the ideal partner.
2.name: Michael Johnson
2.title: Director of AlphaStream Technologies

1.title: Full Stack Software Developer
1.desc: Developed and delivered software projects for various clients. Utilized modern technologies like React.js, Next.js, and Django to create scalable and efficient web applications tailored to client needs.

2.title: Full Stack Software Developer Trainee - Code Institute
2.desc: Completed an accelerated learning program focused on full stack software development. Delivered multiple projects from day one, gaining hands-on experience with various web technologies.

1.title: Planning & Strategy
1.description: We'll collaborate to map out your website's goals, target audience, and key functionalities. We'll discuss things like site structure, navigation, and content requirements.

2.title: Development & Progress Update
2.description: Once we agree on the plan, I cue my lofi playlist and dive into coding. From initial sketches to polished code, I keep you updated every step of the way.

3.title: Development & Launch
3.description: This is where the magic happens! Based on the approved design, I'll translate everything into functional code, building your website from the ground up.

footer.title: Ready to take your digital projects to the next level?
footer.description: Reach out to me today and let's discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.
